description: This file declares the class FbDiscoveryImplementation which implements interfaces related to Facebook Discovery functionalities, including configuration and discovery operations. It contains method declarations for clearing and managing content access, signing in/out, and watched content management.

classes.name: FbDiscoveryImplementation
classes.description: Implementation of Facebook Discovery interface and configuration interface, managing content access, sign-in/sign-out, and watching content. It is designed to work within the WPEFramework plugin architecture.

methods.name: Configure
methods.description: Configures the component using the provided shell.

methods.name: ClearContentAccess
methods.description: Clears access to content based on context.

methods.name: ContentAccess
methods.description: Manages content access with specified identifiers.

methods.name: WatchNext
methods.description: Sets up the next content to watch.

ctags.name: FbDiscoveryImplementation
ctags.pattern: /^    class FbDiscoveryImplementation : public Exchange::IFbDiscovery, public Exchange::IConfigura/
